notesStmt.note: "The Epistle dedicatory" to William Moreton, Bishop of Kildare, William Sheridan, Bishop of Kilmore and Ardagh, and Richard Tenison, Bishop of Kilalla.
Imperfect: second sermon lacking in filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
